description: Each time you get hit, you drop a coin or two.
角色受伤时会生成 1-2 个硬币
title: Swallowed Penny
unlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #15 (Slow Roll).

description: While held, Isaac has a significantly higher chance to find drops when breaking poops.
角色摧毁大便时生成金币和心的概率提高
title: Petrified Poop

description: Lowers your spacebar item charge rate by 1.
Cannot lower the charge of your spacebar item below 1 room.
For example, you will now be able to use a 3 room charge item after 2 rooms instead.
若清理完房间后主动道具的充能还差一格充满,则会自动使充能充满(如充能数为 2 的道 具在清理完房间后直接充满)
对 THE BATTERY(蓄电池)的过度充能无效
title: AAA Battery

description: Does the teleport effect every time you use your current spacebar item.
Can be used infinitely every room if you have Guppy's Paw and no red heart containers (Can be exploited to get to the boss room without clearing any other rooms).
每次使用主动道具时,会被随机传送到本层的一个房间
不会被传送到恶魔/天使房或 Error 房
配合 Guppy's Paw(嗝屁猫的爪子)或 How to Jump(如何跳跃)有奇效
title: Broken Remote

description: Higher chance for champion enemies while held.
一定几率使挑战房被替换为 Boss 挑战房
提高遇到精英敌人的概率
title: Purple Heart

description: Has a partial Magneto effect and will attract coins, pulling them into Isaac from a distance.
Does not attract other pickups like the full Magneto item does.
使房间内的硬币慢慢向角色方向移动,并且无视障碍物影响
title: Broken Magnet

description: Increases your chances to find an Angel Room instead of a Devil Room.
Normally there is a 50%/50% chance of a Angel or Devil room with if a door spawns after the boss. The Rosary Bead changes this to a 75%/25% chance of an angel or devil room (respectively).
提高恶魔房被转换为天使房的概率(例如:如果原转换率为 50%,则携带该饰品时的转换 率大约为 75%)
title: Rosary Bead

description: When Isaac takes damage, there is a chance he will gain the Gamekid effect, turning him invincible and dealing contact damage to any enemies he touches.
The chance to activate the invincibility effect is affected by your luck stat and at +38 Luck it will activate every time you get hit.
角色受伤时有一定几率触发 The Gamekid 的效果,无敌数秒并对接触到的敌人造成伤害
触发几率与角色的幸运有关,当幸运达到 38 时必定触发
title: Cartridge

description: Tears shrink and grow in size as they go across the room.
Does not appear to affect your damage and only the hitbox size of tears.
子弹变大,碰撞体积增加
title: Pulse Worm

description: Tears now move in a wave fashion across the room.
子弹会扭动前进
title: Wiggle Worm

description: While held, tears move in a spiral pattern across the screen at high speed.
Effectively increases your range due to the tear pattern.
子弹会回旋前进(类似于魂斗罗中 F 弹的效果)
由于子弹的前进特性,射程显著增加
title: Ring Worm

description: Tears become flat and disc shaped giving them a larger hitbox.
Higher knockback effect with your tears.
子弹变扁,碰撞体积增加
子弹的击退效果增加
title: Flat Worm

description: While this trinket is held, all items in the Shop cost 0 coins.
After buying any 0 cent item in the Shop, the trinket disappears.
持有该饰品时,商店内所有物品价格为 0(免费)
使用该饰品的效果并获得一个免费物品后,该饰品消失
title: Store Credit
unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Lazarus.

description: Isaac no longer takes damage from walking over spikes and blood creep while this trinket is held.
角色不再受到地形伤害,包括地面的液体和刺等等。
title: Callus

description: Rocks now drop money when broken.
摧毁石头会生成硬币
title: Lucky Rock
unlock: Unlock this item by destroying 100 rocks.

description: Mom's Leg will now appear every 60 seconds and stomp down randomly in the room dealing 300 damage to enemies, similar to how Daddy Longlegs works but less frequent.
Be warned though, Mom's leg can also stomp and hurt Isaac too!
每 60 秒,妈腿会在房间内一个随机位置踩下来,造成 300 点伤害
对角色也会造成伤害
可以踩开普通房门
title: Mom's Toenail

description: Increases the chance for Black hearts to spawn.
提高黑心的掉落几率
title: Black Lipstick
unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Eve.

description: Gives you a higher chance of eternal hearts.
Contrary to popular belief, the Bible Tract doesn't allow Angel Rooms to appear after paying for a Devil Deal.
提高白心的掉落几率
title: Bible Tract

abred: In Afterbirth Cain starts with this trinket after donating 68 coins to the Greed Donation Machine.
description: Allows you to unlock golden chests without needing a key.
Does not work on locked rooms.
开金宝箱时不耗费钥匙
【DLC】在 Afterbirth 中,向贪婪捐款机捐款累计 68 个硬币后,Cain(该隐)将初始携带该道具
title: Paper Clip

description: When you reach half a heart of life remaining, a black heart will spawn.
After three black hearts have spawned, the trinket dissapears.
当角色受伤后血量只剩半心时,会在地上生成一颗黑心,同时饰品的样子会发生改变
掉落 3 颗黑心后,该饰品消失
title: Monkey's Paw

description: Imitates the behaviours of some of the other 'paper' items/trinkets.
A Missing Page: When taking damage, Isaac has a chance to deal damage to the entire room in a Necronomicon style effect.
Has a chance to trigger the Polaroid or Negative effect every time you take damage with half a red heart or less.

Missing Poster: Dying in a sacrifice room while holding this trinket will reveal a puzzle piece on the death screen. Finding all the puzzle pieces will help you to reveal the final secret, unlocking the hidden character 'The Lost'.
If held when you touch the chest after the Satan or Isaac fight and you don't have the relevant item to go to the next floor (Polaroid or Negative), you have a small chance to be taken there anyway.
一定几率触发其他纸张类道具或饰品的效果
纸张类道具或饰品包括:Missing Page 2(迷失书页 2)、Polaroid(全家福)、Negative(底 片)、Missing Poster(寻人启事)
title: Mysterious Paper
unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Eden.

description: When Daemon's Tail is held, most future Heart drop will be rerolled into something else, with a certain chance to be rerolled into a Black Heart.
Every type of heart will be affected (except for hearts spawned in Super Secret Rooms) and causes Mitre, Bible Tract, Mom's Pearl to become useless.
Upon entering a new room that already has hearts on the ground, they will all be converted into Black Hearts.

Hearts that spawn after clearing a room, opening a chest or playing a slot machine/beggar will be re-rolled into another possible pickup that could appear. This essentially means you are sacrificing your heart drops for a higher chance of all other pickups
将所有的魂心/白心/红心掉落强制转换为黑心
减少所有心掉落的概率(包括清理房间和使用赌博机/预言机的时候)
使用 V - Hierophant(教皇)和 VI - Lovers(爱人)卡片时,掉落的心可能减少 1 个
title: Daemon's Tail
unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Azazel.

abred: In Afterbirth dying with this trinket causes you to respawn as The Lost character and dying in a sacrafice room while holding this trinket will now unlock the Lost character.
description: Dying in a sacrifice room while holding this trinket will reveal a puzzle piece on the death screen. Finding all the puzzle pieces will help you to reveal the final secret, unlocking the hidden character 'The Lost'.
持有该饰品时在献祭房的刺上死亡后,死亡界面的死因会显示一块碎片;通过收集齐足够 的碎片可以发现解锁 The Lost 的步骤
【DLC】在 Afterbirth 中,持有该饰品时在献祭房的刺上死亡后可以直接解锁 The Lost;原有的解锁步骤失效
title: Missing Poster
unlock: Unlock this item by beating Dark Room with Isaac.

description: Everytime you pick up a coin, you fart.
捡起硬币时会放屁
title: Butt Penny

description: Causes Isaac to create poops randomly.
角色会随机放屁或生成大便
title: Mysterious Candy

description: Tears now move forwards at right angles, shifting left and right across the room.
Increases your range stat by +10.0 while held but due to the fire pattern, your tears travel a similar distance to normal.
子弹会按照直角左拐、直角右拐的路线前进
射程+10,但是由于子弹的前进特点,实际射程并没有显著提升
title: Hook Worm

description: +0.5 Shot Speed Up.
Your tears now whip across the room at a very high shot speed.
Shot speed gives your tears more effective range, but doesn't increase your range stat directly.
子弹飞行速度显著提高,使得实际射程提高
title: Whip Worm

description: Has a chance (roughly 20%) to respawn with 3 Soul hearts as Blue Baby when you die.
角色死亡后有 20%几率复活成???(小蓝人),拥有 3 颗魂心
title: Broken Ankh
unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Lazarus.

description: Everytime Isaac takes damage, one blue fly will spawn.
角色受伤时会生成一只蓝苍蝇
title: Fish Head

description: Isaac's tears have a chance to poison enemies.
The poison effect leaves a damage over time, which deals 4 or 6 damage per tick.
The chance to poison enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +18 Luck it will activate every time.
角色有一定几率射出带毒子弹
被带毒子弹击中的敌人在一定时间内受到 4-6 点/帧的中毒伤害
射出带毒子弹的几率与角色的幸运有关,当幸运达到 18 时必定射出
title: Pinky Eye

description: Isaac now has a chance to make a spectral and piercing tear.
The chance to fire a piercing tear is affected by your luck stat and at +18 Luck it will activate every time.
角色的子弹有一定几率可以穿透障碍物和怪物
射出穿透子弹的几率与角色的幸运有关,当幸运达到 18 时必定射出
title: Push Pin

description: While held, this trinket gives a random mushroom effect each room
Possible mushrooms include: Mini Mush, Odd Mushroom (Thin), Odd Mushroom (Thick), The Compass.
每次切换房间后随机获得以下道具之一的效果:Mini Mush(迷你菇)、Odd Mushroom (Large) (奇怪的蘑菇◆大)、Odd Mushroom (Thin)(奇怪的蘑菇◆小)、The Compass(指南针)
title: Liberty Cap

description: If you take damage which leaves you at 1/2 a heart, you gain a Little Steve familiar that follows you and shoots homing tears.
如果角色受伤后血量为半颗心,会在当前房间生成一个 Little Steve(小史蒂夫)跟班
title: Umbilical Cord

description: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find hearts from drops after clearing a room and from chests.
清理房间或从宝箱中获得红心的概率提高
title: Child's Heart
pickup: It calls out to its brothers

description: +2 Damage Up
伤害+2
title: Curved Horn
unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Judas.

description: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find keys and chests.
获得钥匙和金宝箱的几率提高
title: Rusted Key

description: +0.15 Speed Up.
title: Goat Hoof

description: Higher chance to find Soul Hearts.
提高红心被转换为魂心的概率
title: Mom's Pearl

description: -2 Tear Delay (Tears Up).
The fire rate increase is applied in such a way that the higher your tear stat is, the more effective Cancer is.
Breaks the normal fire rate cap, allowing you to fire faster than the normal maximum.
子弹延迟-2(射速上升)
该饰品的射速上升效果可以突破子弹延迟为 5 的限制
title: Cancer

description: You have a chance when taking damage to gain +1.8 Damage Up for the rest of the room.
角色受伤时,在当前房间的伤害有一定几率增加+1.8
title: Red Patch

description: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find bombs.
清理房间或从宝箱中获得炸弹的概率提高
【DLC】通过捡起该饰品可以卸下 Tick(血虱)
title: Match Stick

description: +1 Luck Up while held.
幸运+1
title: Lucky Toe
unlock: Unlock this item by blowing up 20 shop keepers (this includes the ones in the secret room).

description: When you take damage while on 1/2 a heart, you are teleported back to the previous room.
若角色受伤后血量为半颗心,角色会被传送到之前一个房间
title: Cursed Skull

description: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find pills.
获得胶囊的概率提高
title: Safety Cap

description: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find Tarot cards after clearing a room or from chests.
获得卡片的概率提高
title: Ace of Spades

description: After clearing a room, you have a chance to heal for half a red heart.
清理完房间后有 10%几率回复半红心
title: Isaac's Fork

description: When taking damage, Isaac has a chance to deal damage to the entire room in a Necronomicon style effect.
The chance to damage enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +50 or more Luck it will activate 50% of the time.
角色受伤时有一定几率触发 Necronomicon(死灵书)效果
触发几率受角色幸运影响,当幸运在 50 以上时有 50%几率触发
title: A Missing Page

description: Everytime you pick up a penny, you have a chance to spawn a red heart on the floor.
每次捡起硬币时有 50%几率在地上生成半颗红心
title: Bloody Penny
unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Samson.

description: Everytime you pick up a coin, you have a chance to spawn a bomb on the floor.
每次捡起硬币时有 50%几率在地上生成炸弹
title: Burnt Penny
unlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #13 (Beans!).

description: Everytime you pick up a coin, you have a chance to spawn a key.
每次捡起硬币时有 50%几率在地上生成钥匙
title: Flat Penny

description: When picking up a coin, you have a chance to automatically gain one more coin.
每次捡起硬币时有 50%几率额外增加一枚硬币
title: Counterfeit Penny
unlock: Unlock this item by playing the shell game in the arcade 100 times.

description: When you enter a boss room, immediately remove 15% health from the boss and restore 1 red heart.
This trinket cannot be replaced or dropped, meaning you are unable to take any more trinkets unless you get the Mom's Purse item.
若敌人的血量超过 60,则其血量减低 15%
进入 Boss 房时回复 1 红心
一旦拾取就无法被替换或卸下
【DLC】拾取饰品 Match Skick(火柴棒)时该道具可以被替换
title: Tick

description: While held, this trinket gives Isaac a familiar that shoots piercing tears that deal 3.5 damage.
持有该饰品时会生成一个跟班,射出的子弹带穿透怪物的效果,伤害为 3.5 点
title: Isaac's Head
unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Boss Rush with Isaac.

description: At the start of a new floor, you get an eternal heart.
进入新的一层时会获得一颗白心
title: Maggy's Faith
unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Maggy.

description: Items which cost 2 heart containers in a deal with the devil are reduced to only cost 1 heart.
恶魔房内所有需要 2 个心之容器交换的道具只需要 1 个心之容器就可以交换
title: Judas' Tongue
unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Judas.

description: Creates a familiar which moves around the room in a similar fashion to The Peeper, shooting tears in the same direction as Isaac.
生成一个跟班,在房间内弹跳移动(轨迹类似 Peeper 的眼睛),会和角色同时射出子弹, 子弹带跟踪效果
title: ???'s Soul
unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Blue Baby.

description: When you kill an enemy, you have a chance to get +0.5 damage up for the current room.
杀死一个敌人后,角色有一定几率在当前房间伤害+
title: Samson's Lock
unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Samson.

description: Gives a 25% chance to reveal map icons at the start of a new floor (The same effect as the Compass).
进入新的一层时有 25%几率获得 The Compass(指南针)效果
title: Cain's Eye
unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Cain.

description: When you kill an enemy, you have a chance to spawn a transparent Dead Bird familiar.
The Dead Bird familiar deals 2 damage per tick to enemies while in contact with them.
杀死敌人时有一定几率生成一个透明的 Dead Bird(死鸟)跟班,会追逐敌人并造成 2 点/ 帧的接触伤害
title: Eve's Bird Foot
unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Isaac boss with Eve.

description: Replaces chest spawns with red chests.
将普通宝箱和金宝箱转换为红宝箱
title: The Left Hand
unlock: Unlock this item by beating Ultra Pride.
pickup: The left hand path reaps dark rewards

description: While held, tinted rocks and rocks with a crawlspace below them will flash white every 10 seconds.
宝箱石头或下面有地道入口的石头每 10 秒闪烁一次
title: Shiny Rock

description: Turns all troll bombs into bombs which you can pick up and use.
Super Troll bombs turn into 1+1 free double bomb pickups.
使房间内的即爆炸弹自动转化为基础掉落的炸弹(可以被拾取)
超级即爆炸弹将被转化为 1+1 炸弹
title: Safety Scissors

description: Gives your tears a random worm effect every few seconds.
The possible tear effects include: Whip Worm, Ring Worm, Wiggle Worm, Flat Worm, Hook Worm, Pulse Worm, Tape Worm and Lazy Worm
每隔几秒会随机获得一个虫饰品的效果
title: Rainbow Worm

description: While held, Tape Worm doubles your range stat and halves your tear height stat.
射程 X2
子弹高度 X0.5
title: Tape Worm

description: -0.4 Shot Speed Down.
+4.0 Range Up.
+2.0 Tear Height.
射程+4
子弹高度+2
title: Lazy Worm

description: Every time you get hit, you have a chance to activate the D6, D20, D8 or D12 effect.
每次受伤会随机触发以下道具之一的效果:D6、D20、D8、D12
title: Cracked Dice
unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greed Mode with ???.

description: While held this trinket causes all pickups and enemies to move slowly towards you.
Will also attract the Mom's Foot and Ultra Greed door entities.
将房间内所有掉落物和敌人向角色方向吸引
也会影响 Mom(妈腿)的腿和 Ultra Greed(终极贪婪)房间内的门
title: Super Magnet

description: Randomly Isaac will gain a camouflage for a few seconds and all enemies in the current room will have a confused status effect applied to them.
角色会有一定几率伪装成保护色,持续数秒,使当前房间内的敌人进入混乱状态(移动路 径随机,无法以角色为目标)
title: Faded Polaroid

description: Gives a small chance to spawn a friendly attack spider while in a hostile room with enemies.
在有敌人的房间内,有小概率生成一只蓝蜘蛛
title: Louse

description: Leaves a pool of green creep under all bombs you place, which damages enemies that walk over it.
角色放置的炸弹爆炸后会留下一滩绿色液体,对踩在上面的敌人造成伤害
title: Bob's Bladder

description: Gives you an increased chance of finding battery consumables.
提高获得电池的概率
有一定几率在角色清理完一个房间后获得额外的一格充能
title: Watch Battery

description: Exploding bombs now have a chance to drop another bomb that you can pick up.
炸弹爆炸后有一定几率掉落一个炸弹(可被拾取)
title: Blasting Cap

description: Higher chance to find crawl spaces when exploding rocks.
提高炸石头时发现地道的概率
title: Stud Finder
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #27 (Brains).

description: Gives a different trinket effect per room, randomly choosing between any of the other available trinkets in the game.
Each room is locked to a specific trinket effect, meaning if you exit and re-enter a room, that specific room will always have the same effect.
在每个不同的房间随机获得一种饰品的效果
对于同一个房间,获得的饰品效果是固定的
title: Error

description: Chests now have a 50/50 chance to either pay out with extra consumables or nothing/an enemy.
宝箱有 50%概率有额外掉落物,有 50%概率是空的或一个敌人
title: Poker Chip
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #26 (I Rule).

description: Tears have a stronger knockback effect while this trinket is held
子弹获得更大的击退效果
title: Blister

description: Increases the time that status effects stay on enemies. e.g. With poison effects, the damage over time poison will last for much longer.
延长敌人受到状态影响的时间,如:敌人进入中毒或魅惑等状态的时间会被延长
title: Second Hand

description: While held there is a small chance when using a tarot card or pill that a copy of it will be dropped on the floor next to you.
使用卡片/符文或胶囊时有一定几率会在身边掉落一个完全一样的卡片/符文或胶囊
title: Endless Nameless

description: +0.2 Damage Up for each 'evil' item you have.
Items classed as evil in this case are Black Candle, Ceremonial Robes, Abaddon, Goat Head, Match Book, Missing Page 2, Safety Pin.
角色每拥有一个“evil”道具,伤害+0.2
“evil”道具包括:Black Candle(黑蜡烛), Ceremonial Robes(仪式法袍), Abaddon(亚巴 顿), Goat Head(山羊头), Match Book(纸板火柴), Missing Page 2(迷失书页 2), Safety Pin (安全别针)
title: Black Feather
unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greed Mode with Eve.

description: Invincibility lasts longer after getting hit (Increased i-frames)
This makes it possible to use the Blood Donation machine twice from one hit of damage.
延长受伤后的无敌时间
被延长后的无敌时间足够使角色连续两次使用献血机而只损一次血
title: Blind Rage
unlock: Unlock this item by beating Blue Womb (Hush) with Samson.

description: Trinket effect not confirmed yet!
下一层的宝物房有 15%的几率会出现两个道具,但是拾取一个后另一个会消失(即二选一)
如果拥有 Mom's Box(妈妈的盒子),几率为 30%
title: Golden Horse Shoe

description: Automatically opens all shop room doors for free.
进入商店门时不耗费钥匙
title: Store Key
unlock: Keeper starts with this trinket after beating Satan with Keeper.

description: Forces the Greed and Super Greed mini bosses to no longer appear in shops or secret rooms.
使商店和隐藏房不会再出现 Greed(贪婪)和 Super Greed(超级贪婪)
title: Rib of Greed
unlock: Unlock this trinket by beating Ultra Greed with Keeper.

description: Donating to a Donation Machine has a chance to heal Isaac for a full red heart or spawn a Beggar.
向捐款机捐款有一定几率使角色回复 1 红心,或在地上生成一个乞丐
title: Karma
unlock: Unlock this item by beating The Lamb boss with Keeper.

description: Destroying poops now gives you a blue fly
摧毁大便时会生成一只蓝苍蝇
title: Lil Larva

description: While held, you heal for half a red heart every time you use a key to open a door or golden chest.
每次使用钥匙时会回复半红心
所有地上的半红心会被转换为一个完整的红心
title: Mom's Locket

description: While this trinket is held you have a significantly lower chance to find spacebar/active items.
It will cause passive items to spawn except when the game cannot generate any more passive items and will then instead choose spacebar/active items.
Some hard coded spacebar items from bosses and mini-bosses (i.e. Krampus Head) can still spawn.
Bible drops caused by the Rosary item are not prevented by this trinket.
持有该饰品时,道具池中的所有主动道具将从道具池被移除
饰品被卸下或换掉后,此效果会消失,但不影响已经生成的被动道具
对图书馆道具无效
对一些小 boss 的固定掉落道具无效,如 Krampus’ Head(坎普斯的头)、Bob's Rotten Head (鲍勃的烂脑袋)
对 ROSARY(念珠)强制增加在道具池的 The Bible(圣经)无效
title: NO!

description: Causes your familiars to stay closer to each other.
使所有跟班聚在一起
title: Child Leash

description: Poop in the environment will now explode when destroyed.
摧毁大便时大便会爆炸
title: Brown Cap
